entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
